data.name: 行界：遗 WENT:OneAlive
data.detailed_description:
*WENT:OneAlive is AVG and puzzle-solving game.*
*WENT:OneAlive is the prequel of the mobile game WENT:Zero.*
*WENT:OneAlive was once an LBS exploratory game. *

Story

A lonely city survived by high technology at the end of the day.
A girl who can invade the brain terminal to read the mind.
The myriad doubts and hidden crises caused by a small case.

You need to find clues in the corners of the city.
You have to look for clues in people's minds and memories.
You have to make your own choices and judgments based on the information you get.

You make a choice, find a clue, invade an object,
Step by step into danger or step by step close to the truth?

Choice

In this lonely city,
In the face of all kinds of people and things,
Do you choose to guard order or liberate humanity?
Or both?

Exploration

Visit him and her in the city, and even it.
Understanding the course and details of the case;
Go to the corner of the city and find the missing clues.
Determine the key evidence of the case;
Digging the story of the city,
Revealing the past of civilization,
Find the answer to the end.

Invasion

Pay close attention to what everyone says.
Discovering key information hidden behind evidence and dialogue,
Choose the right information bomb to break through each other's psychological barrier.
Enter its ideological realm.

* QQ Group: 250293575*

data.short_description: A lonely city survived by high technology at the end of the day. A girl who can invade the brain terminal to read the mind. The myriad doubts and hidden crises caused by a small case. You need to find clues in the corners of the city. You have to look for clues in people's minds and memories.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 / Windows 8 / Windows 10 64 bit
  • Processor: 2.50GHz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 2 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes:
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64 bit
  • Processor: 3.50GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GT520
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes:

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
